name: Bot Carnage
description:
This is a game I originally created for the 2022 Epic Megajam.

Movement:

WASD : Move

Space : Jump

Left Click : Shoot

Shift : Sprint

M : Main Menu

The Game Consists of Platforms, which contain Bots that you need to kill, otherwise your health will gradually decrease and you die! After you kill all bots in a level, The Platform Walls will come down and you can jump to the next Platform below, which will have even more Bots

The Number of bots will increase as you progress through Platforms

How many Platforms can you clear?
